template.name: m2layoutxml
template.value: <?xml version="1.0"?> <page xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" layout="1column" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="urn:magento:framework:View/Layout/etc/page_configuration.xsd"> <body> <referenceContainer name="content"> <block name="prestafy_hello_index" class="Prestafy\Rede\Block\Hello" template="hello.phtml" /> </referenceContainer> </body> </page>
